page.title: 20SPECIALIST SHOP IN TILTON
page.content: {SILK GALLERY AT TILTON-ON-THE-HILL A small village shop in Tilton specialises in articles made from pure silk e.g. lavender bags,handbags, cushions, silk flowers, blouses, scarves, etc. These are collected from all over the world and some are made by talented housewives both locally and in other parts of the country.The shop, or gallery as it is known, is an extension, formerly a garage to a private house. It is built from stones from an old windmill which once stood in the garden. It is filled with fine old local country furniture which makes an interesting background for the silk goods on display. The business has attracted great interest both from shoppers and from groups who can attend talks on the history of silk given by the owner.
